import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ResourceService } from '../../Services/resource/resource.service'; import { Resource } from '../../DTO/resource'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { resources: Resource[] = []; constructor(private resourceService: ResourceService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.fetchResources(); } fetchResources(): void { this.resourceService.getResources().subscribe( (resources: Resource[]) => { this.resources = resources; }, (error) => { // Gérer les erreurs ici } ); } }
